text: Innum nam tutarkal luttitam vanta potu avarkalin karanamaka avar kavalai kontar. Melum avarkalal (varukaiyal) cankatappattar; avarkal'nir payappataventam, kavalaiyum pataventam' enru kurinarkal. Niccayamaka nam um'maiyum un manaiviyait tavira um kutumpattinaraiyum kapparruvom; aval (um'manaivi alintu povoril oruttiyaka) pin tanki vituval
